short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeper is one app to run your bookkeeping business. We allow bookkeepers to run their entire month-end close in one tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeper's chrome extension helps accountants and bookkeepers sync to their accounting ledger. Accountants and bookkeepers can now make changes to transactions within Keeper and that will sync back to their accounting ledger.
